content.webTitle: Guardian wins two Design Week awards

fields.headline: Guardian wins two Design Week awards
fields.bodyText: The Guardian has won two Design Week awards. The awards showcase the best work from all design disciplines, giving outstanding designers global recognition. For the second year in a row the Guardian won the award for best editorial design, this time for the redesign of Guardian Weekly. It was also honoured with the inaugural best in-house design team award for the Guardian’s print and digital products. Judges commented: “Since the rebrand, the Guardian’s identity has not only become further embedded but grown. Its in-house team is world class, and clearly carried out the day-to-day - pushing boundaries while maintaining lovely consistency.” A full list of the winners can be found here.
